recipesJson.name: TOO MUCH CRUNCH
recipesJson.author: Deejay_mills
recipesJson.description: Crunch Berry Cereal with very realistic mouthfeel.

reviews.text: Before I moved to DIY, my favorite juice was a Crunch Berries mix that I wasn't ever able to get close to replicating. Until I found this.  It's exactly what the profile should taste like without being overly sweet.  I cut the sweetener in half, and it's perfect.  Good stuff here.
